verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> for I have <S%H3513>hardened<s%> his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> that I might <S%H7896>show<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> my <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H7130>before<s%> him:

And that you may <S%H5608>tell<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of your <S%H1121>son,<s%> and of your <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> things I have <S%H5953>worked<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and my <S%H226>signs<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>done<s%> among them; that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> how that I am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews,<s%> <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H4970>long<s%> will you <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H6031>humble<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> me? let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> me.

<S%H3588>Else,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H3986>refuse<s%> to let my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> to <S%H4279>morrow<s%> will I <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H697>locusts<s%> into your <S%H1366>coast:<s%>

And they shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H5869>face<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> that one <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of that which is <S%H6413>escaped,<s%> which <S%H7604>remains<s%> to you from the <S%H1259>hail,<s%> and shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> which <S%H6779>grows<s%> for you out of the <S%H7704>field:<s%>

And they shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H1004>houses,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> your <S%H1>fathers'<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H7200>seen,<s%> <S%H4480>since<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that they were on the <S%H127>earth<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> And he <S%H6437>turned<s%> himself, and <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> shall <S%H2088>this<s%> man be a <S%H4170>snare<s%> to us? let the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that they may <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> you not <S%H2962>yet<s%> that <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is <S%H6>destroyed?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%> but <S%H4310>who<s%> are they that shall <S%H1980>go?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H3212>go<s%> with our <S%H5288>young<s%> and with our <S%H2205>old,<s%> with our <S%H1121>sons<s%> and with our <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> with our <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and with our <S%H1241>herds<s%> will we <S%H3212>go;<s%> for we must hold a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, Let the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be <S%H3651>so<s%> with you, as I will let you <S%H7971>go,<s%> and your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones: <S%H7200>look<s%> to it; for <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you.

Not <S%H3651>so:<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> you that are <S%H1397>men,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for that you did <S%H1245>desire.<s%> And they were <S%H1644>driven<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H5869>presence.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> that they may <S%H5927>come<s%> up on the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H1259>hail<s%> has <S%H7604>left.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> forth his <S%H4294>rod<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5090>brought<s%> an <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> on the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3915>night;<s%> and when it was <S%H1242>morning,<s%> the <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H5375>brought<s%> the <S%H697>locusts.<s%>

And the <S%H697>locusts<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5117>rested<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>grievous<s%> were they; <S%H6440>before<s%> them there were <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3651>such<s%> <S%H697>locusts<s%> as they, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them shall be such.

For they <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5869>face<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>earth,<s%> so that the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H2821>darkened;<s%> and they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1259>hail<s%> had <S%H3498>left:<s%> and there <S%H3498>remained<s%> not <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3418>green<s%> thing in the <S%H6086>trees,<s%> or in the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> through <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

Then <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in <S%H4116>haste;<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and against you.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H5375>forgive,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, my <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> this <S%H6471>once,<s%> and <S%H6279>entreat<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that he may <S%H5493>take<s%> away from me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H7535>only.<s%>
And he <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H6279>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> a <S%H3966>mighty<s%> <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> which <S%H5375>took<s%> away the <S%H697>locusts,<s%> and <S%H8628>cast<s%> them into the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea;<s%> there <S%H7604>remained<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H697>locust<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> so that he would not let the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that there may be <S%H2822>darkness<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even <S%H2822>darkness<s%> which may be <S%H4959>felt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> forth his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and there was a <S%H653>thick<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%>

They <S%H7200>saw<s%> not <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> <S%H376>any<s%> from his <S%H8478>place<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> in their <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3212>Go<s%> you, <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> let your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds<s%> be <S%H3322>stayed:<s%> let your <S%H2945>little<s%> ones <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> with you.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> You must <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings, that we may <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

Our <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with us; there shall not an <S%H6541>hoof<s%> be <S%H7604>left<s%> behind; for thereof must we <S%H3947>take<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God;<s%> and we <S%H3045>know<s%> not with <S%H4100>what<s%> we must <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>
But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>hardened<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and he <S%H14>would<s%> not let them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3212>Get<s%> you from me, <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to yourself, <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more;<s%> for in that <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> you shall <S%H4191>die.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> You have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H3651>well,<s%> I will <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>
